title: Hiroshima and Nagasaki: The Physical, Medical, and Social Effects of the Atomic Bombings
description: Written 36 years after the event, here is the definitive scientific report on the only experience to date with nuclear warfare. The short- and the long-range effects of the most portentous and terrifying event of the 20th century. Compiled by Japanese authorities, it combines physical, psychological and social consequences of the two events.
author: COMMITTEE ETC
